```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "How.often.were.you.in.danger.of.being.injured.or.killed..i.e...being.pinned.down..overrun..ambushed..near.miss..etc..."
t <- "How often were you in danger of being injured or killed (i.e. being pinned down, overrun, ambushed, near miss, etc.)?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q87_danger_frequency")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q87_danger_frequency/q87_danger_frequency.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q87_danger_frequency/q87_danger_frequency_", q_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")
qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
q_plot <- clean_single_select_y(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_y(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q87_danger_frequency")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q87_danger_frequency/q87_danger_frequency.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q87_danger_frequency/q87_danger_frequency_", qf_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```
